entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: E 29 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets near noon then to rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
